title: feature request: reflect.DeepEqual details of difference
body:
by **autarch**: 
When writing tests, it'd be really nice to know exactly _how_ two things are not equal.
This is particularly useful when comparing two structs with a few fields (that may
themselves be nested structs/maps/arrays/etc).

As it stands now, I have to print both structs out and eyeball them for the differences.
It'd be really nice to get some sort of details.

This probably requires recording some sort of path traversal info as we go through the
traversal.

I'd be up for trying to implement this if I knew what sort of API would be acceptable.
Should this be a change to the DeepEqual() interface or a new function call like
DeepEqualDiff()? What exactly should the return value be? Etc.
